meta.title: Home - East Chicago Lighthouse Charter School | Arts Infused Program

meta.name: description
meta.content: Home - East Chicago Lighthouse Charter School is a charter school that takes a restorative approach to education. Visit our website to learn how we are making a difference.
Home - East Chicago Lighthouse Charter School is a charter school that takes a restorative approach to education. Visit our website to learn how we are making a difference.
Home - East Chicago Lighthouse Charter School | Arts Infused Program

body.class: fsLiveMode fsHasHeader fsHasMenu fsHasFooter fsHasOneColumnLayout home fsHasTheme5

section.class: fsElement fsMedia fsPlayer universal-slideshow hero-treatment fsSingleItem

div.div: There are no events to display

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsList module fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailFull fsItemCount_15

img.alt: Indiana charter school awarded grant funding from ACR/JAMS Foundation

div.a: Indiana charter school awarded grant funding from ACR/JAMS Foundation

div.p: Lighthouse Academies’ Gary, Indiana college prep academy for grades 9-12 will be awarded $60,000 in funding over a two-year period from the Association for Conflict Resolution (ACR) and the JAMS Foundation (JAMS).

img.alt: Lighthouse Academies Announces Formation of the Alltrust Impact Scholarship for Lighthouse Scholars

div.a: Lighthouse Academies Announces Formation of the Alltrust Impact Scholarship for Lighthouse Scholars

div.p: Lighthouse Academies today announced the establishment of the Alltrust Impact Scholarship. Three Lighthouse Academies graduating seniors will each receive a one thousand dollar scholarship from the fund.

img.alt: Four Gary Lighthouse Preparatory Academy Students Graduate with Both High School Diplomas and Associates Degrees

div.a: Four Gary Lighthouse Preparatory Academy Students Graduate with Both High School Diplomas and Associates Degrees

div.p: For four students of the Gary Lighthouse College Preparatory Academy, graduation day was doubly sweet. In addition to earning high school diplomas, they each also were awarded associate degrees from Ivy Tech Community College of Indiana.

div.a: U.S. News & World Report Awards Bronze Medals to Gary Lighthouse Charter School

div.p: Gary Lighthouse Charter School and Indianapolis Lighthouse Charter School each are recognized by U.S. News & World Report in its annual national ranking of top performing schools for 2018. The rankings are based on each school’s performance on state-required tests and how well they prepare students for college. Both schools earned Bronze medals. More than 20,000 schools from across the 50 states and the District of Columbia were included in the analysis and rankings.

img.alt: Ivy Tech's Honors Program gives top students a boost

div.a: Ivy Tech's Honors Program gives top students a boost

div.p: For Joy Spence, the Ivy Honors program at Ivy Tech Community College was a chance to learn what NOT to do in college.

img.alt: How a gritty Midwestern city is emerging as a model for civility

div.a: How a gritty Midwestern city is emerging as a model for civility

div.p: Gary, Ind., hosts World Civility Day on Thursday, drawing attendees from as far afield as Kenya as part of an ongoing campaign that has boosted not only civility but also the city’s own self-image.

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

article.h2: Now accepting applications for 2020/2021 school year!
